title: Software Engineer
summary: Passionate software engineer with expertise in full-stack development, modern web technologies, and scalable application architecture. Experienced in building robust applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Strong problem-solving skills with a focus on clean code and user experience.
highlights: Developed and deployed full-stack applications using modern frameworks
Implemented responsive web designs with focus on performance optimization
Experience with microservices architecture and API development
Proficient in both frontend and backend development workflows
Active contributor to open-source projects and technical communities
